description: Tied down and restrained in almost every way possible, there's no chance of escape for Brez Wild as Sebastian sets upon him. It's that hot ass that he's after, and Seb is not going to be happy until he's stretched it wide open with various toys while Brez moans in pain. The poor boy will never be the same again once he's had his hole abused!
title: Brez Wild & Sebastian Kane
